Posts.Content: Good Luck with your rads. I am fair skinned and am half way through with no rash or burning, so lets hope the same goes for you!. I will keep you in my prayers. Marilyn
Posts.Title: Finally started rads today

Posts.Content: they turned dark brown and black and as they grew out they started to fall out. I heard that might happen. I can't wait til they grow back in naturally so I can get a manacure. love marilyn
Posts.Title: Toenail

Posts.Content: thanks for making me laugh today God bless -Marilyn
